data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Djelfa, Algeria to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Djelfa, Algeria
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Djelfa, Algeria to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 231 believers in Djelfa against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, we pray that the people of Djelfa, Algeria will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Bedouin, Chaamba people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, please raise up prophets in Djelfa who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Djelfa.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Djelfa, Algeria has a population of 339,300.

We estimate Djelfa has 231 people who might know Jesus, 28 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 339,041 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 1,468 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Djelfa.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
